Geothermal reservoir.Description: Geothermal reservoirs are used as a source of heat for geothermal power plants.
Geothermal reservoirs provide the heat source for geothermal heat pumps used for heating and cooling buildings.
Geothermal reservoirs are the primary source of geothermal energy, which is used for electricity generation and heating purposes.
The temperature and pressure of a geothermal reservoir are influenced by the geothermal gradient, which is the rate of increase in temperature with depth in the Earth's crust.
